attributes.action: We have no confidence in Boris Johnson to represent Parliament as Prime Minister
attributes.background: Boris Johnson's unsigned letter to the EU and his separate letters to EU leaders, showing he does not support it, demonstrate his arrogance and childish refusal to properly represent Parliament. We have no confidence he will represent us properly and he is not fit for public office.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions calling for people to be given or to lose jobs. This includes calling for votes of no confidence.
